edu.rit.numeric

Interface Bits


  • public interface Bits
    Interface Bits specifies the interface for a group of bit positions to be extracted from a BigInteger.
    See Also:
    BigInteger.extractBits(BigInteger,Bits)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int bit(int i)
      Returns the i-th bit position to be extracted.
      int size()
      Returns the number of bits to be extracted.

    • Method Detail

      • size

        int size()
        Returns the number of bits to be extracted.
        Returns:
        Number of bits.

      • bit

        int bit(int i)
        Returns the i-th bit position to be extracted.
        Parameters:
        i - Index, 0 ≤ i ≤ size()−1.
        Returns:
        i-th bit position.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - (unchecked exception) Thrown if i is out of bounds.
